name: Rise Of The Sorgon
description: In 4100, on a distant planet called Birchington. War breaks out between Species, when an evil villain named Thardral threatens to harness The Sorgon. A powerful weapon used to control any living person he-so desires. The player gets to decide whether they want to work to stop Thardral head-on, or decide to follow in his foot-steps and harness The Sorgon themselves...You will meet many species, on many different planets, in this Open-World SCI-FI RPG Extravaganza.
